availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James C. Brookover (Maysville, Kentucky, grocery merchant)

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, grocery merchant. Ohio native. Married to Rachel Brookover. Father of Henry Brookover. Grocery merchant in Maysville from 1850 to 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, District 2, p. 108. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 304. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Henry County, KY, October 1863, p. 12, (Accessed via ancestry.com). Find A Grave, "James C. Brookover (1827-1866)," Memorial #128439900, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/128439900/james-c.-brookover (accessed November 13, 2017).
